ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of GREGG D.R. ERAUW of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective May 30, 2017.
